item.title: 核心业务下滑，LVMH 销售额下降 3
item.description: 路威酩轩集团 全球最大的奢侈品集团路威酩轩集团（LVMH）周一表示，第一季度销售额下降了 3%，低于预期，这也证实了该行业的增长放缓，因为在动荡的经济环境下，购物者减少了对名牌时装的购买。【原文：LVMH , the world's largest luxury group, said on Monday sales fell 3% over the first quarter, missing expectations and confirming a sector slowdown as shoppers held back on purchases of designer fashion in a choppy economic environment.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Qube 公布 1.05 亿美元的特朗普媒体空头头寸
item.description: 根据提交给德国联邦公报《Bundesanzeiger》的文件，对冲基金 Qube Research & Technologies 周一公布了针对特朗普媒体与科技集团股票的约 1.05 亿美元的空头头寸。【原文：Hedge fund Qube Research & Technologies unveiled a roughly $105 million short position against shares in Trump Media & Technology Group on Monday, according to a filing with Germany's federal Gazette Bundesanzeiger.】

item.title: 华纳音乐任命前动视暴雪高管为财务总监
item.description: 华纳音乐集团（Warner Music Group）是艾德-希兰（Ed Sheeran）和杜阿-利帕（Dua Lipa）等艺人背后的唱片公司，该音乐娱乐公司周一表示，已任命前动视暴雪（Activision Blizzard）高管阿明-泽尔扎（Armin Zerza）为财务总监。【原文：Warner Music Group , the label behind artists such as Ed Sheeran and Dua Lipa, has appointed former Activision Blizzard executive Armin Zerza as its finance chief, the music entertainment company said on Monday.】

item.title: 纽约联储：纽约联储：3 月近期通胀预期将在情绪恶化的情况下跳升
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周一发布的一份报告称，在公众对个人财务状况和就业前景的评估变差的情况下，美国人对近期通胀的预期在3月份达到了2023年秋季以来的最高水平。【原文：Americans’ expectations for near-term inflation hit the highest level since the fall of 2023 in March, amid a souring in the public’s assessment of their personal finances and hiring prospects, a report from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York said on Monday.】

item.title: 美国共和党参议员要求特朗普政府撤回限制全球使用人工智能芯片的规定
item.description: 据路透社看到的信件副本显示，七名共和党参议员周五致信美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克，敦促政府撤回拜登政府在最后一刻通过的一项将控制全球人工智能芯片准入的规定，并警告称这些限制将损害美国在人工智能领域的领导地位。【原文：Seven Republican senators sent a letter to U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick on Friday, urging the administration to withdraw a last-minute Biden administration rule that would control global access to AI chips, warning the restrictions would damage U.S. leadership in artificial intelligence, according to a copy of the letter seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 苹果期权看涨交易收获颇丰，股价因关税豁免而跳涨
item.description: 一位身份不明的期权交易商押注苹果公司股价短期反弹，押注金额高达数百万美元，结果获得了可观的利润，因为在特朗普政府周末批准对智能手机免征关税之后，这家 iPhone 制造商的股价周一飙升。【原文：An unidentified options trader's multi-million dollar bet on a short-term rebound in Apple Inc.'s shares was set to reap a sizable profit as the iPhone-maker's shares soared on Monday following the Trump administration's weekend move to grant tariff exclusions for smartphones.】

item.title: 巴西家乐福销售总额增长 3.6
item.description: 家乐福巴西公司在周日提交的一份证券文件中说，包括燃料在内，该公司第一季度的销售总额为288亿雷亚尔（约合49.3亿美元），比去年同期增长了3.6%。【原文：Carrefour Brasil's gross sales in the first quarter including fuel totaled 28.8 billion reais ($4.93 billion), a 3.6% increase from a year earlier, the retailer said in a securities filing on Sunday.】

item.title: 世界黄金协会称中国黄金ETF四月流入量超过第一季度总量
item.description: 世界黄金协会（World Gold Council）的数据显示，本月迄今为止，流入中国实物黄金交易所交易基金的投资资金已超过第一季度全年，并超过了流入美国上市基金的资金。【原文：Investment flows into Chinese physically backed gold exchange-traded funds so far this month have exceeded those for the whole of the first quarter and overtaken inflows registered by U.S.-listed funds, World Gold Council data showed.】

item.title: 高盛下调铝价预期，因增长前景疲软
item.description: 在特朗普政府大幅提高关税之后，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）的经济学家下调了包括美国和中国在内的全球经济增长预期，因此高盛周一下调了今年的铝价预期。【原文：Goldman Sachs on Monday reduced its forecast for aluminium prices this year after its economists downgraded global growth forecasts including for the U.S. and China following the Trump administration's move to sharply increase tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普关税导致成本上升，芭比乐园一片愁云惨淡
item.description: TikTok 的影响者和收藏家 Noemi de Lama 在她位于西班牙北部港口希洪（Gijon）的家中被数百个芭比娃娃包围着，她与她的追随者们分享了一个消息：美国的关税很可能会推高他们喜爱的娃娃的价格。【原文：Surrounded by hundreds of Barbies at her home in the northern Spanish port of Gijon, TikTok influencer and collector Noemi de Lama has shared the news with her followers that U.S. tariffs are likely to drive up the price of their favourite dolls.】

item.title: 科迪亚克机器人公司将通过 SPAC 交易上市，估值 25 亿美元
item.description: 自动驾驶卡车技术公司科迪亚克机器人公司（Kodiak Robotics）周一表示，该公司计划今年晚些时候通过与空白支票公司 Ares Acquisition Corp II 合并在美国上市，科迪亚克公司的估值为 25 亿美元。【原文：Autonomous truck technology firm Kodiak Robotics said on Monday it plans to go public in the U.S. later this year through a merger with blank-check company Ares Acquisition Corp II , valuing Kodiak at $2.5 billion.】

item.title: Kraken 宣布推出免佣金交易
item.description: 加密货币交易所 Kraken 周一宣布在其平台上推出美国上市股票和 ETF 免佣金交易。【原文：Cryptocurrency exchange Kraken on Monday announced the rollout of commission-free trading for U.S.-listed stocks and ETFs on its platform.】

item.title: 富国银行称科技银行团队去年增长 20
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo）周一表示，由于美国科技行业的增长，其技术银行部门的员工人数在过去一年中增加了 20%，2025 年还将有更多的招聘计划。【原文：Wells Fargo said on Monday its technology banking unit increased its headcount by 20% over the past year on the back of growth in the U.S tech sector, with additional hires in the pipeline for 2025.】

item.title: 英伟达称与合作伙伴合作在美国制造人工智能超级计算机
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）周一表示，它正在与合作伙伴合作，设计并建造完全在美国生产人工智能超级计算机的工厂。【原文：Nvidia said on Monday it was working with partners to design and build factories to produce AI supercomputers entirely in the U.S.】

item.title: 芯片制造商 Qorvo 任命两位行业资深人士进入董事会
item.description: 芯片制造商 Qorvo 周一表示，在激进投资者 Starboard Value 推动公司提振疲软股价之际，公司任命业内资深人士 Richard Clemmer 和 Christopher Koopmans 为董事会独立董事。【原文：Chipmaker Qorvo appointed industry veterans Richard Clemmer and Christopher Koopmans as independent directors to its board, it said on Monday, amid activist investor Starboard Value's push to boost the company's weak share price.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，沙特阿拉伯计划偿还叙利亚的世界银行债务
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的人士说，沙特阿拉伯计划偿还叙利亚欠世界银行的债务，为批准数百万美元的重建拨款和支持该国瘫痪的公共部门铺平道路。【原文：Saudi Arabia plans to pay off Syria's debts to the World Bank, three people familiar with the matter said, paving the way for the approval of millions of dollars in grants for reconstruction and to support the country's paralysed public sector.】

item.title: 英特尔将向银湖出售 Altera 51% 的股份
item.description: 英特尔公司周一表示，将向私募股权公司银湖（Silver Lake）出售 Altera 51% 的股份，可编程芯片部门的估值为 87.5 亿美元。【原文：Intel said on Monday it would sell a 51% stake in Altera to private equity firm Silver Lake, valuing the programmable chip unit at $8.75 billion.】

item.title: 经济停滞不前，德国竭力拉动消费者消费
item.description: 在全球贸易充满不确定性、关税战对金融市场造成严重破坏的情况下，德国下届政府希望释放国内消费，以重振数十年来一直由出口拉动的停滞不前的经济增长。【原文：With global trade deeply uncertain and a tariff war causing havoc on financial markets, Germany's next government is hoping to unleash domestic consumption to revive stalled growth in an economy that has been driven for decades by exports.】

item.title: 下一页 迪凯德与道达尔能源达成液化天然气供应协议
item.description: NextDecade 公司周一表示，法国道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies）将从 Rio Grande LNG Train 4 购买每年 150 万吨液化天然气（LNG），为期 20 年。【原文：NextDecade said on Monday France's TotalEnergies will buy 1.5 million tonnes per annum (MTPA) of liquefied natural gas (LNG)for 20 years from Rio Grande LNG Train 4.】

item.title: 欧佩克以美国关税为由下调 2025 年全球石油需求增长预期
item.description: 欧佩克周一下调了2025年全球石油需求增长预期，理由是第一季度收到的数据和美国宣布的贸易关税的影响，同时还下调了今明两年的全球经济增长预期。【原文：OPEC cut its 2025 global oil demand growth forecast on Monday, citing the impact of data received for the first quarter and trade tariffs announced by the U.S., and also reduced its global economic growth forecasts for this year and next.】

item.title: 中国敦促美国就所报道的深海金属储存计划遵守国际法
item.description: 在有报道称美国计划储存深海金属以对抗中国在该领域的主导地位后，中国外交部周一表示，任何国家都不应绕过国际法授权在海底进行资源勘探。【原文：No country should bypass international laws to authorise resource exploration in the seabed, China's foreign ministry said on Monday, following a report of U.S. plans to stockpile deep-sea metals to counter China's dominance in the sector.】

item.title: 在特朗普征收关税之际，企业撤回指导意见
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普自 4 月 2 日起征收的全面关税以及随后暂停征收的部分关税给全球企业带来了不确定性，导致一些企业撤回或不提供财务指导。【原文：The sweeping tariffs imposed by U.S. President Donald Trump since April 2 and the subsequent pauses on some of them have generated uncertainty for companies worldwide, causing some of them to withdraw or refrain from giving a financial guidance.】

item.title: 中国电池制造商 CATL 第一季度净利润增长 33
item.description: 中国电动汽车电池巨头 CATL 周一提交的一份股票市场文件显示，该公司第一季度净利润同比增长 32.9%。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle battery giant CATL increased first-quarter net profit by 32.9% year on year, a stock market filing showed on Monday.】

item.title: 透析公司 DaVita 遭勒索软件攻击
item.description: DaVita 周一表示，它已意识到发生了勒索软件事件，该事件已加密了其网络的部分内容，促使这家透析公司采取措施限制漏洞的影响。【原文：DaVita said on Monday it had become aware of a ransomware incident that has encrypted some elements of its network, prompting the dialysis firm to implement measures to limit the effect of the breach.】

item.title: 交易员带来收益，高盛利润大增
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）公布第一季度利润增长 15%，原因是市场波动导致股票交易收入创下新高，并推动了固定收益业务的业绩增长。【原文：Goldman Sachs reported a 15% rise in first-quarter profit as market volatility led to record revenue in equities trading and boosted fixed income results.】

item.title: 美国电力行业顶级首席执行官的绩效薪酬高达 1.15 亿美元
item.description: 由于加密货币和人工智能行业的蓬勃发展，美国十大公用事业公司的电力需求大幅跃升，在最近的三年时间里，这些公司的首席执行官们总共赚取了超过 1.15 亿美元的收入。【原文：CEOs of the 10 largest U.S. utilities earned more than $115 million combined in a recent three-year period as demand for electricity from their power plants jumped substantially due to the burgeoning cryptocurrency and artificial intelligence sectors.】

item.title: 解说：我们对阿根廷的国际货币基金组织协议和外汇政策了解多少？
item.description: 阿根廷已与国际货币基金组织签订了 200 亿美元的扩大基金机制（EFF）协议，并取消了大部分货币管制措施，自由主义总统哈维尔-米莱伊希望借此将阿根廷拖出长期的经济低迷。【原文：Argentina has sealed a $20 billion extended fund facility (EFF) with the International Monetary Fund and dismantled large parts of its currency controls as libertarian President Javier Milei looks to drag the country out of a prolonged economic slump.】

item.title: 早间竞标：复活节升温？市场寻求慰藉
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的关键所在【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 收购公司 KKR 将以 31 亿美元收购 OSTTRA
item.description: S&P Global 和 CME 集团周一宣布，私募股权公司 KKR 将以 31 亿美元收购交易后服务公司 OSTTRA。【原文：Private equity firm KKR will buy post-trade services company OSTTRA in a $3.1 billion deal, S&P Global and CME Group announced on Monday.】

item.title: 数据显示苹果第一季度智能手机销量第一
item.description: Counterpoint Research 公司周一发布的数据显示，由于 iPhone 16e 的推出以及日本和印度等国的强劲需求，苹果公司在第一季度占据了全球智能手机销量榜首的位置。【原文：Apple took the top spot for global smartphone sales in the first quarter on the back of the iPhone 16e's launch and strong demand in countries such as Japan and India, data from Counterpoint Research showed on Monday.】
